import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'sidebar-items', templateUrl: './sidebar-items.component.html', }) export class SidebarItemsComponent { isDropdownOpen: { [key: string]: boolean } = {}; sidebarOpen: boolean = true; // Initially open toggleDropdown(menu: string) { this.isDropdownOpen[menu] = !this.isDropdownOpen[menu]; } toggleSidebar() { this.sidebarOpen = !this.sidebarOpen; } }
